text: May Nights () is a 1952 Soviet comedy movie directed by Aleksandr Rou.«Не виноватая я!». Чем заплатила Светличная за звание секс-символаМайская ночь, или Утопленница (1952) The movie is based on Nikolai Gogol's May Night, or the Drowned Maiden and the subsequent opera version by Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov. It stars Nikolai Dosenko, Tatyana Konyukhova, and Aleksandr Khvylya. ==Actors== * Nikolai Dosenko as Levko Makogonenko * Tatyana Konyukhova as Hanna Petrichenkova * Aleksandr Khvylya as Evtukh Makogonenko, village leader * Liliya Yudina as The Officer's Daughter * Galina Grigoreva as The Witch- Stepmother * Georgiy Millyar as The Village Clerk == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1952 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Rou
title: May Nights
